rules_text:
Pay 3 life: Chance-in-Hell phases out.
[i]Augmented[/i] – At the beginning of your end step, discard a card or sacrifice a nonland permanent. If you've spent {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} to cast spells this turn, instead each opponent does both, then you may exile Chance-in-Hell and return her to the battlefield transformed at the beginning of your next upkeep.
special_text2:
[-1]: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gets +1/+0 and gains haste, flying, vigilance, and lifelink until end of turn.
[-X]: Destroy all other nonland permanents with mana value X or less.
[-5]: Look at the top ten cards of your library. Put up to five of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
